name: Sebastian Arlt
background: Sebastian Arlt serves as Commissioning Editor, Documentaries at RTL. Focus areas: Documentaries, factual entertainment. They are looking for: Crime documentaries with emotional impact; access-led series into German institutions; character-driven series. Overall network strategy: RTL seeks commercial factual content with broad mainstream appeal that delivers emotional impact and engaging storytelling through relatable characters and familiar institutions.
thematic_priorities: Commissioner-specific: Crime documentaries with emotional impact; access-led series into German institutions; character-driven series
High-impact documentaries with broad mainstream appeal
Character-driven factual series featuring compelling, relatable individuals
Access-led documentary series into German institutions or communities
Preferred format: Series (4–6 episodes) with potential to return annually
Limited interest in singles unless tied to significant events
History documentaries with dramatic storytelling and broad appeal
Science programming accessible to mainstream audiences
Focus on sensational or mystery-driven content
Preferred format: Series (3–4 episodes) with strong narrative hooks
target_audience: Broad mainstream audiences; younger-skewing 14–49 where applicable

additional_info.commissioning_cycles: Ongoing; submissions accepted year-round unless strand-specific
additional_info.strategic_shifts: Increasing focus on distinctive voices and cross-platform reach
additional_info.diversity_inclusion: Emphasis on diverse voices on- and off-screen
additional_info.regional_production: Support for projects from across German regions (where applicable)
